definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Dynamic and thermal brake torque characteristics of the larger.
sentences.chinese: 热动和制动转矩较大等优良的特性。

sentences.english: A theoretical study on the determination of the torque distribution ratio in transfer case is conducted.
sentences.chinese: 提出了分动器转矩分配比确定方法。

sentences.english: The speed estimation is core question of the speed sensorless direct torque control system.
sentences.chinese: 速度辨识是无速度传感器直接转矩控制的核心问题。

sentences.english: Another kind requests the motor output low torque, maintains the high speed.
sentences.chinese: 另一种是要求马达输出小转矩，保持高转速。

sentences.english: Torque on a Magnetic Dipole in a Constant Field.
sentences.chinese: 稳恒磁场中磁偶极子的转矩。

sentences.english: At present, because of the application of computer, the performance of torque measuring instrument has been improved greatly.
sentences.chinese: 目前，由于微机的应用，转矩测量仪性能大大提高。

sentences.english: The torque rheometer is an ideal instrument used to study flowing property of polymer material.
sentences.chinese: 转矩流变仪是研究材料流变性能的重要仪器。

sentences.english: These advantages make Synchron Motors ideally suited for a broad range of speeds with light to moderate torque loads.
sentences.chinese: 这些优势使其成为轻，中度转矩负载应用的理想选择。

sentences.english: The torque sensor, which is capable of detecting the cutting torque without contact, is developed.
sentences.chinese: 开发了不用接触就能测得铣削扭矩的转矩传感器。

sentences.english: The low-velocity friction torque model proposed in this paper conformed well to the experimental results.
sentences.chinese: 所建立的低速摩擦转矩模型与实验结果基本一致。

sentences.english: The torque ripple could be significantly reduced by SVM-based DTC scheme.
sentences.chinese: 基于SVM的DTC方案可以有效地减小转矩波动。

sentences.english: This thesis research the direct torque control of square-wave brushless DC motor.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究方波无刷直流电机的直接转矩控制。

sentences.english: Formulas are derived for calculating running and starting capacitance.
sentences.chinese: 以最大起动转矩为条件，导出了起动电容计算公式。

sentences.english: The armature voltage and external load torque are inputs to the system.
sentences.chinese: 电枢电压和外负载转矩是系统的输入。

sentences.english: External torques arise from outside the system.
sentences.chinese: 外转矩是由系统外部生产的。

sentences.english: Cogging torque is one of the main concerns of permanent magnet motor.
sentences.chinese: 齿槽转矩削弱是永磁电机研究的重点和难点之一。

definition: angular velocity/number of revolutions per minute
(of opposing teeth, or gears) to mesh/to engage
rating (for power output, flame resistance etc)
